R

Reversi - Class in view
This is the entry point to the program.
Reversi() - Constructor for class view.Reversi
 
ReversiBoard - Class in view
This class captures the row, column, and color of a move and passes it from the model to the view.
ReversiBoard(ReversiModel) - Constructor for class view.ReversiBoard
Constructor for ReversiBoard.
ReversiBoardTests - Class in tests
This class collects all of the test methods for ReversiBoard.
ReversiBoardTests() - Constructor for class tests.ReversiBoardTests
 
ReversiController - Class in controller
This class handles the main calculations and logic of the program.
ReversiController(ReversiModel) - Constructor for class controller.ReversiController
Constructor for ReversiController.
ReversiControllerTests - Class in tests
This class collects all of the test methods for ReversiController.
ReversiControllerTests() - Constructor for class tests.ReversiControllerTests
 
ReversiModel - Class in model
This class holds the underlying structure of the program and specifically the Reversi game board.
ReversiModel() - Constructor for class model.ReversiModel
Constructor for ReversiModel
ReversiModelTests - Class in tests
This class collects all of the test methods for ReversiModel.
ReversiModelTests() - Constructor for class tests.ReversiModelTests
 
ReversiView - Class in view
This is the view class for the Reversi program.
ReversiView() - Constructor for class view.ReversiView
 
row - Variable in class view.ReversiView
